data.eml:eml: New species and new records of gelechiid moths (Lepidoptera, Gelechiidae) from southern Siberia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bidzilya, Oleksiy, Nupponen, Kari (2018): New species and new records of gelechiid moths (Lepidoptera, Gelechiidae) from southern Siberia. Zootaxa 4444 (4): 381-408, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4444.4.2
